title: ISSA adopts securities custody and settlement financial crime principles
text:
ISSA adopts securities custody and settlement financial crime principles more+ Contact

ISSA has adopted a set of financial crime compliance principles which aim to support the efforts of the global community of securities custodians and intermediaries to address the critical challenges posed by financial crime. These principles aim to establish a clear global standard for the opening and maintenance of cross-border securities accounts. They focus on governance and control, due diligence and third party client business (Source: ISSA Adopts Financial Crime Compliance Principles for Securities Custody and Settlement )
